module.name: general_design_connectivity
module.keywords: module, contact, feature, joint, fit, terminal, transport, shape, constraint, occurrence, connectivity, assembly

inscope.li: identification of relations between shape feature definitions;
identification of re-usable contact feature definitions and fit relations between them;
identification of contact features for parts and product occurrences that are intended to be joined with other contact features in an assembly;
identification of transport features for the transport of information, energy or matter within a part or a product occurrences;
identification of terminal features for the exchange of information, energy or matter on parts and product occurrences;
identification of feature joints between features of product occurrences in an assembly;
identification of feature constraints between features of product occurrences in an assembly;
identification of a set of connected terminals on a piece part and/or on the terminals of product occurrences in an assembly;
items within the scope of application module Assembly constraints, ISO/TS 10303-1794;
items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Item definition structure, ISO/TS 10303-1345;
items within the scope of application module Part shape, ISO/TS 10303-1807;
items within the scope of application module Shape feature, ISO/TS 10303-1764.

aa.refpath: assembly_shape_constraint <= shape_aspect shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition = product_definition
